destDir.description: Output directory where the zip will be generated

destFileName.description: File name of the generated zip

items.description: List of provisioning items to bundle in in the package zip

type.description: Discriminator identifying this `items` entry as a CX page

builtSources.description: Path (relative to the Angular workspace root) to the directory used as the `outputPath` of the `ng build` command

builtIndex.description: Path (relative to the `builtSources` property) to the built index file which contains the script and stylesheet tags created by the Angular compiler

entryFile.description: Path (relative to the Angular workspace root) to the *.hbs file to be served by CX as the entry point for this page

modelXml.description: Path (relative to the Angular workspace root) to the model.xml file for this page

icon.description: Path (relative to the Angular workspace root) to the image file to use as the catalog icon for this page

skipCleanUp.description: Whether to skip deleting tmp files created during packaging (useful for debugging)
